p.font:
The next edition of Odoo Experience Online is coming soon!
To stir up your curiosity, have a look at all the great talks scheduled and highlighted in our agenda!

div.h3:
Get 6-months' worth of knowledge
in just 2 days
div.p: Learn through workshops, product demos, and inspiring talks from Odoo Experts and Partners.

div.h3:
Meet (other) awesome members
of the community
div.p: Create your very own chat room or join an existing one that sparks your interest.

div.class: row s_col_no_resize s_col_no_bgcolor align-items-center o_cc o_cc1

div.h3:
An interactive, fun
and comprehensive experience
div.p: Experience everything from a virtual exhibitor's hall to multiple interactive presentations and demos.

div.class: s_call_to_action o_mail_snippet_general o_cc o_cc3 pt40 pb40

h3.font: And it won't cost you a thing!

p.font: Zero, zilch, nada! Odoo Experience is free for everyone!

div.p:
Issue
#42

p.a: Delicious recipes from around the world

img.alt: Man on a rock looking at mountains in the distance

div.p: Bitten by the travel bug but looking to travel consciously? Eco-travel is the way forward.
Imagine waking up with more energy, more flexibility, with less stress and fewer instances of anxiously rushing out the door.

div.h2: Delicious recipes from around the world
div.p: Travel without leaving your kitchen with these international recipes. From Canada to Australia, Mexico to Sweden, and everywhere in between.

We are proud to announce that due to our remarkable growth in the Springfield area, we are moving to a new location on July 1.
We will continue to offer the same friendly service at our new address on 1600 Main Street,
which will allow us to offer an even larger selection of products and services.
See you there,

Michael Fletcher
Customer Service
